feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: In a tight labour market, approving new coal and gas mines is not just bad for the climate. It also raises the cost of public infrastructure. Chief Economist Greg Jericho explains. #auspol
entry.content: In a tight labour market, approving new coal and gas mines is not just bad for the climate. It also raises the cost of public infrastructure. Chief Economist Greg Jericho explains. #auspol

entry.title: Despite record-low unemployment, Australian employers are still managing to steal on average more than 280 hours from their employees each year. That's seven 38-hour weeks spent working for free. Dr Fiona Macdonald explains. #auspol
entry.content: Despite record-low unemployment, Australian employers are still managing to steal on average more than 280 hours from their employees each year. That's seven 38-hour weeks spent working for free. Dr Fiona Macdonald explains. #auspol

entry.title: Clive Palmer, one of Australia's richest men, is suing Australia for at least $41.3bn, claiming it breached the ASEAN free trade agreement in relation to coal exploration permits. But he's doing so...as a foreign investor? Listen to Stephen Long on the la
entry.content: Clive Palmer, one of Australia's richest men, is suing Australia for at least $41.3bn, claiming it breached the ASEAN free trade agreement in relation to coal exploration permits. But he's doing so...as a foreign investor? Listen to Stephen Long on the latest episode of Follow the Money via link in bio. #auspol

entry.title: Labor's down in the polls, but there's an obvious fix. Rejigging the Stage 3 tax cuts is a popular policy option that would deliver more to those who need it most. Senior Fellow and Contributing Editor Stephen Long explains. #auspol
entry.content: Labor's down in the polls, but there's an obvious fix. Rejigging the Stage 3 tax cuts is a popular policy option that would deliver more to those who need it most. Senior Fellow and Contributing Editor Stephen Long explains. #auspol
